descript.abstract: This dataset depicts the areas of the Transitway boarding platforms. The geography was created referencing CAD drawings for the Northstar platforms and by heads-up digitizing platforms for Blue and Green Line Platforms.
descript.purpose: To have a general depiction of the Northstar Commuter Rail platforms and the Blue and Green Line platforms.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington.

timeperd.current: Data is current as of Time Period of Content Date.

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Hennepin County, Anoka county, City of Anoka, City of Coon Rapids, City of Fridley, City of Elk River, City of Big Lake, Sherburne County, Anoka County, City of Minneapolis

theme.themekey: Commuter rail, Northstar, stations, light rail transit, Transit, transporation, buses, bus rapid transit, BRT, Green Line, Blue Line, Red Line

attracc.attraccr: The attribute reflects station names provided on http://www.northstartrain.org/ .

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy. The dataset was created by identifying approximate station locations referencing CAD files as well as head-up digitizing

procstep.procdesc: The dataset was created by using heads-up digitizing and referencing CAD drawings.

overview.eaover:
ATTRIBUTES:
Station : The name of the station.
Direction: The typical directionality of the train when stopping at the platform.
Type: Transitway type (commuter rail, light rail, bus rapid transit)
Name: Route name
Transitway: Name of transitway (blue line, red line etc..)
PlatformID: A unique identification number of each platform

The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.

digtinfo.transize: Less than 1 Mb for zip file.
